title: Frame extraction failed. Video files must be corrupted.
body:
Hello, my apologies if this has been posted before but I searched through previous issues and did not see this. I am having an issue running extract_frames() after creating a new project, and the error message I receive does not provide me with any information about where to begin troubleshooting. Any help is greatly appreciated! **Please state your operating system, env, and which version of DeepLabCut you are using.** macOS 10.15.4, with an Anaconda Env, & DeepLabCut2.1.8. **Describe the problem** Any time I attempt to run extract_frames() after creating a new project it returns the error shown in the screenshot "Frame extraction failed. Video files must be corrupted." This happens regardless of what video I use, even the example open field video provided in the p Please place code inside this:
Code output

deeplabcut.create_new_project('deeptfc', 'kpuhger', ['/Users/kpuhger/1-Projects/DeepTFC/videos/3_trial/train/tfc_3trial_run1_box1.wmv'], working_directory='/Users/kpuhger/1-Projects/DeepTFC/') Created "/Users/kpuhger/1-Projects/DeepTFC/deeptfc-kpuhger-2020-06-01/videos" Created "/Users/kpuhger/1-Projects/DeepTFC/deeptfc-kpuhger-2020-06-01/labeled-data" Created "/Users/kpuhger/1-Projects/DeepTFC/deeptfc-kpuhger-2020-06-01/training-datasets" Created "/Users/kpuhger/1-Projects/DeepTFC/deeptfc-kpuhger-2020-06-01/dlc-models" Attempting to create a symbolic link of the video ... Created the symlink of /Users/kpuhger/1-Projects/DeepTFC/videos/3_trial/train/tfc_3trial_run1_box1.wmv to /Users/kpuhger/1-Projects/DeepTFC/deeptfc-kpuhger-2020-06-01/videos/tfc_3trial_run1_box1.wmv /Users/kpuhger/1-Projects/DeepTFC/deeptfc-kpuhger-2020-06-01/videos/tfc_3trial_run1_box1.wmv Generated "/Users/kpuhger/1-Projects/DeepTFC/deeptfc-kpuhger-2020-06-01/config.yaml" A new project with name deeptfc-kpuhger-2020-06-01 is created at /Users/kpuhger/1-Projects/DeepTFC and a configurable file (config.yaml) is stored there. Change the parameters in this file to adapt to your project's needs. Once you have changed the configuration file, use the function 'extract_frames' to select frames for labeling. . [OPTIONAL] Use the function 'add_new_videos' to add new videos to your project (at any stage). Out[3]: '/Users/kpuhger/1-Projects/DeepTFC/deeptfc-kpuhger-2020-06-01/config.yaml' In [4]: cfg_path = '/Users/kpuhger/1-Projects/DeepTFC/deeptfc-kpuhger-2020-06-01/config.yaml' In [5]: dlc.extract_frames(cfg_path) Config file read successfully. Do you want to extract (perhaps additional) frames for video: /Users/kpuhger/1-Projects/DeepTFC/videos/3_trial/train/tfc_3trial_run1_box1.wmv ? yes/no yes Frame extraction failed. Video files must be corrupted.

**How to Reproduce the problem** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Clone deeplabcut from repo 2. Create conda env for dlc-cpu 3. Activate dlc-cpu environment 4. Launch IPython 5. Import deeplabcut 6. Create new project 7. Attempt to extract frames. **Screenshots** ![Screen Shot 2020-06-01 at 11 36 00 AM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25070796/83442467-13a73500-a3fd-11ea-89fd-7fafd5e5b879.png)
